name: Precious Pergatory
description:
Can you escape Purgatory?
To move use the left stick on a gamepad. Arrows and WASD also work on Keyboard.

Game jam game made for LD47
Programing and sound LordKawaii
Music and Sound Rebecca Larkin
Enemy and Map Art ArmageddonRabbit
Concept, BG, and Start Menu Art DeadSquid
